import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Post } from '../models/post.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-post-item', templateUrl: './post-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./post-item.component.css'] }) export class PostItemComponent { @Input() id !:string; @Input() title !:string; @Input() contenu !:string; @Input() index !:number; editingPost: boolean = false; postToEdit: Post | undefined; }
